scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && uv run python -m uvicorn main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port ${BACKEND_PORT:-8000} --ssl-keyfile certs/key.pem --ssl-certfile certs/cert.pem
scripts.prod:backend: cd backend && uv run python -m uvicorn main:app --host ${BACKEND_HOST:-127.0.0.1} --port ${BACKEND_PORT:-9000} --proxy-headers --forwarded-allow-ips='*'
scripts.prod: npm run build:frontend && npm run prod:backend
scripts.install:all: cd backend && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../frontend && npm install
